thread.title: Male Injured Following Second Story Fall In Marion
thread.title_full: Male Injured Following Second Story Fall In Marion

author: Dan McCready
title: Male Injured Following Second Story Fall In Marion
text:
Male Injured Following Second Story Fall In Marion By Dan McCready October 16, 2015 8:42 AM Credit: Marion Police 
A male sustained serious injuries after falling from a balcony in Marion Thursday night. 
Marion Police Chief Lincoln Miller says that at around 6:20 p.m. emergency personell responded to an address on Front St. 
Miller says the male fell from an outdoor second story balcony while attempting to move furniture. 
The victim was transferred to Silvershell Beach then tranported by Med Flight to Rhode Island Hospital. 
The victim’s name and current medical condition hasn’t been released. Sign up for our newsletter Sign up for our newsletter! 1420 Club New Bedford/Fall River Business Listings Welcome back to 1420 Club
